companies.title: Avionics Intern
companies.description: Worked with a team of engineers and students to design and construct an 8-ft. liquid-fueled rocket. Involved in design, planning, and preliminary assembly of avionics/telemetry subsystem.

companies.title: Research Intern
companies.description: Selected by the Center for Excellence in Education (CEE) as 1 of 83 students from around the world to attend the Research Science Institute (RSI) at MIT. Performed computational atmospheric chemistry research at the Harvard-Smithsonian Center for Astrophysics; used MATLAB to analyze and produce visualizations of the impact of oil and gas drilling activity on levels of volatile organic compounds (VOCs) in the atmosphere.

companies.title: Programmer
companies.description: Programmer for FRC (FIRST Robotics Competition) Team 488 and FTC (FIRST Technology Challenge) Team 4041; worked extensively with ROBOTC, C++, and Java. Drive team coach and sole programmer for Team 4041 in the 2013-2014 season.

companies.title: Research Intern
companies.description: Performed atmospheric science research; studied the impact of wildfires on levels of various particulate matter air pollutants in the atmosphere over the western U.S.
